metadata.title: CVE-2017-17785 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In GIMP 2.8.22, there is a heap-based buffer overflow in the fli_read_brun function in plug-ins/file-fli/fli.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-17785` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.8.22-1
gimp-data - 2.8.22-1
libgimp2.0 - 2.8.22-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gimp package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.22-1').
